title: HOLY FAWN Streams Gritty New Single "Beneath A Lightless Star"
description: Right as they're hitting the road with Rivers Of Nihil. The post HOLY FAWN Streams Gritty New Single "Beneath A Lightless Star" appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 7 hours ago
excerpt: Right as they're hitting the road with Rivers Of Nihil.
text: Holy Fawn is back to make your life a little more miserable thanks to their new, gritty single "Beneath A Lightless Star" alongside a Joel Villegas-created visualizer. On the song itself, Holy Fawn guitarist and vocalist Ryan Osterman said: "With 'Beneath A Lightless Star' we wanted to release something with more emotional grit that mirrored the frustration with the state of the world." Holy Fawn is currently on the road with Rivers Of Nihil, Inter Arma, and Glacial Tomb as a part of the Aggressive Progressive Tour. html:
Holy Fawn is back to make your life a little more miserable thanks to their new, gritty single "Beneath A Lightless Star" alongside a Joel Villegas-created visualizer. On the song itself, Holy Fawn guitarist and vocalist Ryan Osterman said: "With 'Beneath A Lightless Star' we wanted to release something with more emotional grit that mirrored the frustration with the state of the world."

Holy Fawn is currently on the road with Rivers Of Nihil, Inter Arma, and Glacial Tomb as a part of the Aggressive Progressive Tour. Get your tickets here.
